description: From Middle English lernd, lernde, equivalent to learn +â€Ž -t.

entries.meaning: (Britain, New England, African-American Vernacular, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, alternative in US, Canada) simple past tense of learn
examples: I learnt so many things in this school.

entries.meaning: (UK, New England, African-American Vernacular, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, alternative in US, Canada) past participle of learn
examples: She has learnt to adapt to the changes quickly.
